Products and Services

Physiotherapy Services at Ascent Physiotherapy Welcome to our comprehensive range of physiotherapy services designed to address various musculoskeletal issues and promote overall well-being.

Products

In addition to our services, we offer a curated selection of physiotherapy products to support your recovery journey. From therapeutic aids to exercise equipment, our products are carefully chosen to complement your treatment plan.
Explore the full range of services and products at Ascent Physiotherapy. Schedule an appointment to begin your personalized path to optimal health and well-being.

Stability Balls

Stability Balls, also known as exercise balls or Swiss balls, are versatile fitness tools designed to improve core strength, stability, and balance. These large, inflatable balls can be used for a variety of exercises, including core workouts, balance training, and stretching. Incorporating a stability ball into your fitness routine helps engage multiple muscle groups and enhances overall body stability.

Add to Cart

Exercise Banding

Exercise bands, also referred to as resistance bands or tubing, are flexible tools used for strength training and rehabilitation exercises. These bands provide resistance in various directions, allowing for a wide range of exercises targeting different muscle groups. They are lightweight, portable, and suitable for users of all fitness levels. Exercise banding is an effective way to add resistance to workouts without the need for heavy equipment.

Add to Cart

Massage and Sports Creams

Massage and sports creams are topical products designed to soothe sore muscles, reduce inflammation, and promote recovery after physical activity. These creams often contain ingredients like menthol, arnica, and essential oils that provide a cooling or warming sensation. Applied directly to the skin, massage and sports creams are commonly used by athletes and individuals engaged in physical activities to alleviate muscle discomfort and enhance relaxation.

Add to Cart

Foam Rollers

Foam rollers are cylindrical tools used for self-myofascial release, a form of self-massage that targets muscle tightness and trigger points. By rolling various parts of the body over the foam roller, individuals can release muscle tension, improve flexibility, and enhance overall mobility. Foam rollers come in different densities and textures, allowing users to choose the level of pressure and intensity suitable for their needs. Regular use of foam rollers can contribute to better muscle recovery and reduced muscle stiffness.

Add to Cart

Physiotherapy Sessions

Our core offering includes individualized physiotherapy sessions tailored to your unique needs. Our experienced physiotherapists utilize evidence-based techniques to alleviate pain, improve mobility, and enhance overall function.

Sports Injury Rehabilitation

For athletes and sports enthusiasts, our specialized sports injury rehabilitation programs are designed to expedite recovery, prevent future injuries, and optimize performance. Whether you're a professional athlete or a weekend warrior, we have the expertise to get you back in the game.

Manual Therapy

Our hands-on manual therapy approach involves skilled manipulation and mobilization techniques to restore joint and tissue mobility, reduce pain, and improve overall function. This personalized approach is effective for various conditions, from acute injuries to chronic pain

Post-Surgery Rehabilitation

If you've recently undergone surgery, our post-surgery rehabilitation programs are crafted to support your recovery journey. We collaborate closely with your surgical team to ensure a comprehensive and seamless rehabilitation process.

Exercise Prescription

We believe in the power of therapeutic exercises to enhance strength, flexibility, and endurance. Our physiotherapists design customized exercise programs that complement your treatment plan, empowering you to take an active role in your recovery

Ergonomic Assessments

For individuals dealing with work-related musculoskeletal issues, our ergonomic assessments provide insights into optimizing your workspace to prevent and alleviate pain. We offer practical solutions to enhance your daily comfort and productivity

Telehealth Services

Can't make it to our clinic? Explore our telehealth services for virtual consultations. Receive expert advice and guidance from the comfort of your home, making physiotherapy accessible wherever you are.
